field.name: Genre
field.description: comma-separated list of genres the movie belongs to

field.name: Rating
field.description: average user rating on IMDB (out of 10)

field.name: Metascore
field.description: aggregated score from professional critics (out of 100)

field.name: Cast
field.description: comma-separated list of the movie's director(s)

field.name: Votes
field.description: number of user votes the rating is based on

field.name: Description
field.description: brief summary of the movie's plot

recordSet.description:
# Version 2:
- **Size**: 20.05 MB
- **Number of Rows**: 10,000
- **Number of Columns:** 15
> Changes: Added movie poster and review, review with highest rating.

# Version 1:
- **Size**: 2.99 MB
- **Number of Rows**: 10,000
- **Number of Columns:** 11

keywords: subject > arts and entertainment > movies and tv shows
name: IMDB Movies Dataset
description:
This dataset includes key details about each movie such as title, release year, certificate (age rating), duration in minutes, genre, IMDB rating, Metascore (a score aggregated from various critics), director, main cast, number of votes, and a brief description.

### Columns Overview:

**Version 1**
- Title: name of the movie.
- Year: year the movie was released.
- Certificate: age rating given to the movie (e.g., PG, R).
- Duration (min): length of the movie in minutes.
- Genre: genre(s) of the movie (e.g., Action, Comedy, Drama).
- Rating: IMDB user rating for the movie.
- Metascore: score from critics.
- Director: director(s) of the movie.
- Cast: main actors in the movie.
- Votes: number of votes the movie received on IMDB.
- Description: brief summary of the movie's plot.

**Version 2**
- Poster: link of the movie poster.
- Title: name of the movie.
- Year: year the movie was released.
- Certificate: age rating given to the movie (e.g., PG, R).
- Duration (min): length of the movie in minutes.
- Genre: genre(s) of the movie (e.g., Action, Comedy, Drama).
- Rating: IMDB user rating for the movie.
- Metascore: score from critics.
- Director: director(s) of the movie.
- Cast: main actors in the movie.
- Votes: number of votes the movie received on IMDB.
- Description: brief summary of the movie's plot.
- Review Count: total count of reviews.
- Review Title: title of the review.
- Review: movie review (review with highest votes on it).

### Possible Use Cases
1. Movie Recommendation Systems
2. Sentiment Analysis
3. Genre Analysis
4. Predictive Modeling
5. Data Visualization

This dataset is versatile and can support a wide range of analyses and applications in both academic research and practical implementations in the entertainment industry.
